snippet: The video from a nearby Burger King showed six law enforcement officers walking toward Usaamah Rahim before they retreat and then shoot him fatally in the front.
abstract: Boston police release surveillance camera video of shooting of terrorism suspect Usaamah Rahim as he advanced toward six officers, who claimed he was planning to decapitate them with knife; video shows that Rahim was not shot in back, but image is too blurry to discern whether he was actually holding a knife.
lead_paragraph: The video from a nearby Burger King showed six law enforcement officers walking toward Usaamah Rahim before they retreat and then shoot him fatally in the front.

headline.main: In Blurry Video of Boston Shooting, Officers’ Retreat Is Clear but Knife Is Not
headline.print_headline: In Blurry Video of Boston Shooting, Officers’ Retreat Is Clear but Knife Is Not
